set.name: Heads I Win, Tails You Lose

card.name: Fabricate
card.property: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Spark Double
card.property: You may have Spark Double enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature or planeswalker you control, except it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature, it enters with an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker, and it isn't legendary if that permanent is legendary.

card.name: Tribute Mage
card.property: When Tribute Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 2, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Blasphemous Act
card.property: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

card.name: Daretti, Scrap Savant
card.property: +2: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. −2: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. −10: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step." Daretti, Scrap Savant can be your commander.

card.name: Fiery Gambit
card.property: Flip a coin until you lose a flip or choose to stop flipping. If you lose a flip, Fiery Gambit has no effect. If you win one or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 3 damage to target creature. If you win two or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 6 damage to each opponent. If you win three or more flips, draw nine cards and untap all lands you control.

card.name: Goblin Archaeologist
card.property: {R}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target artifact and untap Goblin Archaeologist. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Goblin Archaeologist.

card.name: Goblin Kaboomist
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a colorless artifact token named Land Mine with "{R}, Sacrifice this artifact: This artifact deals 2 damage to target attacking creature without flying." Then flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Goblin Kaboomist deals 2 damage to itself.

card.name: Karplusan Minotaur
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Flip a coin. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever you win a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you lose a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

card.name: Krark, the Thumbless
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, return that spell to its owner's hand. If you win the flip, copy that spell, and you may choose new targets for the copy. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

card.name: Tavern Scoundrel
card.property: Whenever you win a coin flip, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another permanent: Flip a coin.

card.name: Frenetic Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{0}: If this permanent is on the battlefield, flip a coin. If you win the flip, exile this permanent and return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If you lose the flip, sacrifice it."

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, Parun
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, Parun deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, you draw a card.

card.name: Ral Zarek
card.property: +1: Tap target permanent, then untap another target permanent. −2: Ral Zarek deals 3 damage to any target. −7: Flip five coins. Take an extra turn after this one for each coin that comes up heads.

card.name: Lightning Greaves
card.property: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

card.name: Mind Stone
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.property: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

card.name: Sword of Vengeance
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike, vigilance, trample, and haste. Equip {3}

card.name: Thought Vessel
card.property: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Whispersilk Cloak
card.property: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {2}

card.name: Buried Ruin
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Great Furnace
card.property: {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Izzet Boilerworks
card.property: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Myriad Landscape
card.property: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.property: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Rogue's Passage
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Temple of Epiphany
card.property: Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Wandering Fumarole
card.property: Wandering Fumarole enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {2}{U}{R}: Until end of turn, Wandering Fumarole becomes a 1/4 blue and red Elemental creature with "{0}: Switch this creature's power and toughness until end of turn." It's still a land.

card.name: Counterspell
card.property: Counter target spell.

card.name: Long-Term Plans
card.property: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card third from the top.

card.name: Muddle the Mixture
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ponder
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

card.name: Preordain
card.property: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Reshape
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Sakashima the Impostor
card.property: You may have Sakashima the Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is Sakashima the Impostor, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Serum Visions
card.property: Draw a card. Scry 2.

card.name: Slip Through Space
card.property: Devoid (This card has no color.) Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Whir of Invention
card.property: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Bloodsworn Steward
card.property: Flying Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.

card.name: Chance Encounter
card.property: Whenever you win a coin flip, put a luck counter on Chance Encounter. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Chance Encounter has ten or more luck counters on it, you win the game.

card.name: Chandra's Ignition
card.property: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.

card.name: Chaos Warp
card.property: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Embercleave
card.property: Flash This spell costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature you control. When Embercleave enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control. Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike and trample. Equip {3}

card.name: Footfall Crater
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains trample and haste until end of turn." Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Gamble
card.property: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.

card.name: Goblin Engineer
card.property: When Goblin Engineer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. {R}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Impulsive Maneuvers
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that creature would deal combat damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time that creature would deal combat damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Mirror March
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, flip a coin until you lose a flip. For each flip you won, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Mogg Assassin
card.property: {T}: You choose target creature an opponent controls, and that opponent chooses target creature. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy the creature you chose. If you lose the flip, destroy the creature your opponent chose.

card.name: Planar Chaos
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Planar Chaos. Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If they lose the flip, counter that spell.

card.name: Risky Move
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player gains control of Risky Move. When you gain control of Risky Move from another player, choose a creature you control and an opponent. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, that opponent gains control of that creature.

card.name: Seize the Day
card.property: Untap target creature. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Temur Battle Rage
card.property: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. Ferocious — That creature also gains trample until end of turn if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Vandalblast
card.property: Destroy target artifact you don't control. Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: The Locust God
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste. {2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Squee's Revenge
card.property: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

card.name: Yusri, Fortune's Flame
card.property: Flying Whenever Yusri, Fortune's Flame attacks, choose a number between 1 and 5. Flip that many coins. For each flip you win, draw a card. For each flip you lose, Yusri deals 2 damage to you. If you won five flips this way, you may cast spells from your hand this turn without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Boompile
card.property: {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy all nonland permanents.

card.name: Commander's Plate
Crooked Scales
card.property: {4}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If you lose the flip, destroy target creature you control unless you pay {3} and repeat this process.

card.name: Shadowspear
Sol Ring
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Talisman of Creativity
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Talisman of Creativity deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Academy Ruins
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Cascade Bluffs
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {U/R}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{R}, or {R}{R}.

card.name: Command Tower
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Desolate Lighthouse
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Flamekin Village
card.property: As Flamekin Village enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Elemental card from your hand. If you don't, Flamekin Village enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {R}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Inventors' Fair
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or more artifacts, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Inventors' Fair: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Reliquary Tower
card.property: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Spinerock Knoll
card.property: Hideaway 4 (When this land enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.) Spinerock Knoll enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {R}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if an opponent was dealt 7 or more damage this turn.

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.property: Sulfur Falls enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.name: Temple of the False God
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

card.name: Tolaria West
card.property: Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with mana value 0, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Training Center
card.property: Training Center enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.
